results.title: Cardioreparation with lisinopril in the management of hypertension and heart failure.
results.text_hl: It would now seem logical to determine whether cardioreparation can be achieved with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@, in whom @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@pathologic remodelling of the myocardium@@@ is responsible for symptomatic @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@.

citations.NLM: Weber KT, Brilla CG, Janicki JS. Cardioreparation with lisinopril in the management of hypertension and heart failure. Cardiology. 1991;79 Suppl 1():62-73. PMID: 1655265
